name: Lego Aba Therapy Center Cubik Minds

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Lego Aba Therapy Center Cubik Minds is a Behavior Analyst provider based in Chatsworth, CA. From 2023-10 through 2024-12, this provider received $1.8M in Medicaid payments across 11K claims serving 2K beneficiaries, billing 5 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 2.2× the national median for H2019 (H2019), at $184 per claim vs. the median of $84, placing them above the 75th percentile.
Spending grew 2622% from $63K in 2023 to $1.7M in 2024.
Saw a 27.2× spike in 2024 ($63K → $1.7M), a sharp year-over-year increase.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $1.8M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
